text.headline: My Journey so far
text.text: From Lund to Uppsala and now Stockholm/Södertälje.

text.headline: Started studying Information and Computer Engineering.
First time as a Teacher Assistant
text.text: Starting as a Teacher Assistant on a summer course in programming and IT engineering. During my studies I have had the opportunity to continue on as a Teacher Assistant for a variety of courses.

text.headline: Bachelor Thesis @STUNS
text.text: Starting my Bachelors Thesis working on the web service 'Energigemenskaper'.

text.headline: Fullstack Developer @Energigemenskaper
text.text: The project was a part of an EU financed via STUNS, in order to shed light on innovative energy solution.

text.headline: Masters Degree in Data Science
text.text: Started my major in Data Science. Here I have studied courses with subjects such as Machine Learning, Data Engineering, Reinforcement Learning and Optimization.

text.headline: Master Thesis @Scania
text.text: During the spring semester I completed my Master Thesis in efficient route planning for electric trucks.

text.headline: Finally an Engineer!
text.text: Working on the predevelopment department for electric vehicles at Scania. In part continuing the work of my Master Thesis, as well as working with embedded systems.
